name: Alex Turner
persona: Alex Turner is a 20-year-old Business Administration major who is currently struggling academically, with a CGPA of 1.60. While Alex has some interest in his studies, he often finds it difficult to stay organized and motivated, and tends to procrastinate on assignments. He sometimes feels overwhelmed by academic challenges, which affects his confidence and perseverance. Despite his low grades, Alex is aware of his struggles and hopes to find better strategies to improve his performance in the future.
